nodes.text: Veedaaz Awmetth was a male individual who was a member of the Galactic Senate circa 19 BBY, and was an ally to Senator Padmé Amidala. Awmetth was one of the many thousands of mourners to attend Amidala's funeral on Naboo.
Veedaaz Awmetth was a character portrayed by Nicholas Ferguson for Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith, however he never made it into the final release of the film.
His first official canon appearance was in the The Topps Company, Inc. Star Wars: Card Trader app, before making another appearance in Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia.
Dave Elsey, the creature shop creative supervisor for Episode III, based Awmetth's appearance on an initial design of Darth Sidious.
